articles.title: 'Crush Feelings': Tinder's new ads show you how it feels to have a crush
articles.author: Ubaid Zargar 28
articles.summary: Tinder has launched a new campaign, 'Crush Feelings,' which uses five films to depict the various emotions associated with having a crush. This campaign aims to position Tinder as the place where crushes begin, using the tagline 'It all starts with a Swipe'.

articles.title: The future of your smartphone just got smarter, thinner and tougher
articles.author: Len Amadora
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring a thinner and lighter design, an upgraded camera system with a 200MP main camera, and enhanced Galaxy AI powered by Gemini. The device boasts features like Generative Edit 2.0 for photo editing and real-time conversation translation.

articles.title: Gross, stinking teenagers the focus of Cuddly's powerful rinse
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Colgate-Palmolive has launched Cuddly Refresh Rinse, a new odour-removing fabric rinse designed to tackle stubborn laundry odours, particularly in activewear. The launch is supported by a campaign from VML highlighting its role as an addition to traditional fabric softeners and detergents in the Australian market.

articles.title: Tesla teases new product release on Friday
articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.summary: Tesla is teasing a new product release for Europe and the Middle East on August 29th, which is speculated to be the Model Y Performance. This new design is likely to be the top performance version of the Model Y, since Tesla stopped selling the Model Y Performance after the Model Y refresh in January.

articles.title: This new WD Blue SSD is designed with creators in mind, but its $56.99 price is calling my name
articles.author: Rosalie Newcombe
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD, a Gen 4 drive targeted at content creators. This upgraded model boasts speeds up to 7,100 MB/s and 6,700 MB/s read and write, and is available in 500GB, 1TB, and 2TB capacities, with a 4TB model coming soon. The starting price is $56.99.

articles.title: Yapping With ChatGPT: Voice Mode With GPT-5 Sounds More Human Than Ever
articles.author: Katelyn Chedraoui
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 with an improved ChatGPT featuring advanced voice mode, providing free users access to the advanced version. The new GPT-5 feature allows users to choose different personality types for the AI, including sassy, nerdy, and robotic avatars.

articles.title: I've Spent Days Testing the Pixel 10 Pro XL and It's Quite the Android Phone
articles.author: Andrew Lanxon
articles.summary: Google is introducing the Pixel 10 Pro XL, featuring a Tensor G5 processor and 16GB of RAM. The phone boasts a vibrant display, improved camera capabilities with AI tools, and smooth performance in gaming and app usage. Initial impressions suggest swift operation and lag-free interface navigation with Android 16.

articles.title: Mentos backx emerging Aussie music talent with Fresh Sounds
articles.author: Mediaweek
articles.summary: Mentos, in collaboration with The Idea Shed, launched 'Fresh Sounds,' a music discovery campaign to support emerging Australian artists. The campaign, running from July to October 2025, involves a purpose-built portal where musicians can upload tracks to Rolling Stone Australia, and reimagines Mentos as a sound brand with various creative executions.

articles.title: Kentucky family capitalizes on dirty soda trend as fewer Americans drink alcohol, study shows
articles.author: Lauren Minor
articles.summary: The Dirty Delight Soda Shop, founded by Kayla and Mike Thurgood in May, offers creative soda beverages as an alternative to alcohol. They launched at local markets, pool parties, and other events to serve the special beverage.

articles.title: Trip.com says AI, adaptability key to industry's success
articles.author: Molpasorn Shoowong
articles.summary: Trip.com launched TripGenie, an AI assistant, to help travellers plan trips and make bookings based on simple requests. The AI assistant suggests itineraries that travellers can adjust, saving planning and booking time.

articles.title: Les Québécois se sont rassemblés une 3e fois contre les prières de rue
articles.summary: Activity data is stored and combined to build user profiles. These profiles include interests and personal aspects. This information is utilized to present more relevant advertising.

articles.title: BetMGM Unveils First Major Corporate Brand Repositioning with "Make it Legendary" Campaign
articles.author: The Pilot News
articles.summary: A brand is launching a sophisticated refresh. The launch includes new advertising spots featuring Jon Hamm.

articles.title: MONAT Unveils Breakthrough Beauty Innovations at MONATions 2025 in Las Vegas
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: MONAT Global Corp. introduced three new haircare product innovations at MONATions 2025. These launches aim to deliver innovative, science-backed, high-quality beauty solutions.

articles.title: Will AI Replace Google Search?
articles.author: Editor In Chief
articles.summary: Google has integrated generative AI into its search results, offering summarized answers above traditional search listings through Search Generative Experience(SGE). Microsoft has merged its search with conversational AI, positioning itself as a competitor to Google with Microsoft Bing + ChatGPT. Platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity AI offer alternatives that bypass traditional search altogether.

articles.title: Genstore Launches AI-Native Store Builder that Simplifies E-Commerce for Local Businesses
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Genstore, an AI-native e-commerce platform, launched to simplify online store management. Genstore aims to remove technical barriers for small and micro businesses. The platform focuses on simplicity and ease of use for merchants.

articles.title: This new WD Blue SSD is designed with creators in mind, but its $56.99 price ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: SanDisk has introduced the WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD, a new Gen 4 drive targeting content creators. The starting price for the WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD is $56.99.

articles.title: Is Mazda's $120 per-year phone app worth it? We find out
articles.author: Miguel Cortina USA TODAY
articles.summary: Mazda introduced the MyMazda mobile app in 2020, offering connectivity features like remote start, vehicle location, and status updates for select vehicles equipped with Mazda Connected Services. The app is complimentary for a trial period, after which it costs $10 per month. While not groundbreaking, the app provides convenience, but lacks features like digital key functionality and Siri integration.

articles.title: Skillful Craftsman Education Technology Ltd. Announces its Sesame Chat App Completes Strategic Upgrade, Pioneering New Frontier in AI Communication Intelligence  Aug. 27, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: Skillful Craftsman Education Technology Ltd. has strategically upgraded its app product 'Sesame Chat', evolving it into an 'AI communication intelligence platform'. This upgrade aims to empower personal and professional development, targeting the market demand for efficient communication by offering forward-looking communication strategies and behavioral recommendations.

articles.title: FreshDirect Hosts Utopia Bagels Pop-Up in Southampton
articles.author: Oliver Peterson
articles.summary: Utopia Bagels is collaborating with FreshDirect to offer a special menu of bagels, including the 'Fresh Catch' bagel made with FreshDirect's lobster salad, at FreshDirect's Southampton location on August 28th. The event marks the end of the summer season for FreshDirect on Main.

articles.title: Zaxbys will open new D-FW restaurant on Sept. 1, continuing larger Texas expansion
articles.author: Anna Butler
articles.summary: Zaxby's is expanding in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, opening a new store in Fort Worth on September 1st, featuring dine-in and drive-through options. Additionally, Zaxby's launched its first ghost kitchen on Commerce Street in West Dallas, enabling delivery service across various Dallas neighborhoods.

articles.title: GD Culture Group Limited to Launch AI Immersive Reading Platform, Inviting Global Storytellers to Join  Aug. 27, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: GD Culture Group Limited and its subsidiary, AI Catalysis Corp., announced the upcoming launch of their AI Immersive Reading Platform, an ecosystem designed to redefine storytelling through interactive and personalized experiences. The platform, powered by AI, allows readers to shape narratives and creators to develop adaptive story scripts. The company expects to launch the Platform to the public by the fourth quarter of 2025 or early 2026.

articles.title: Genstore Launches AI-Native Store Builder that Simplifies E-Commerce for Local Businesses
articles.summary: Genstore launched a new AI-native e-commerce platform designed for small businesses. The platform features AI agents that automate tasks like product listing, SEO, and campaign management. Genstore also integrates with marketplaces like Amazon and social media platforms, providing a centralized hub for managing online sales and marketing.

articles.title: New Garlic 5-Cheese Crust Pizza at Papa Johns Pizza
articles.author: Papa John's
articles.summary: Papa Johns Ardmore introduced a new Garlic 5-Cheese Crust pizza, crafted with fresh dough, garlic-parmesan sauce, and a 5-cheese blend. This limited-time offering is available for carryout or delivery through their website or app, alongside other menu items like New York Style or Original Crust pizzas, wings, and Papadias.

articles.title: I tested the Google Pixel 10 for a week, and it's an AI smartphone done right (so far)
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10, priced at $799. The Pixel 10 includes a three-camera system, Google Tensor G5 chipset, improved battery life, and a new telephoto lens. Its design remains sleek with hardware upgrades that will improve users' experiences.

articles.title: Bennett Foddy's Baby Steps Release Just Got Delayed, But Not by Much
articles.author: Robert Crump
articles.summary: Devolver Digital has postponed the release of its new game 'Baby Steps' from September 8th to September 23rd. The game, available as a demo on Steam, will be released on PC and PS5.

articles.title: HONOR unveils upcoming launch of the new unbreakable AI smartphone
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: HONOR has announced the launch of its new X Series smartphone, featuring improvements in durability, battery life, AI photography capabilities, and design. The smartphone boasts features like the HONOR Anti-Drop Display, a 6600 mAh Silicon-carbon Battery with 66W wired HONOR SuperCharge, and a 108MP OIS AI Camera. Pre-orders begin August 30, 2025.

articles.title: Жара или проливные дожди — какая погода будет на Ставрополье в конце рабочей недели
articles.summary: Urban Fresh Services has launched its Wholesale HDU Sign Division, offering 3D carved HDU signs, dimensional signage, and wholesale sign blanks to contractors, designers, and businesses nationwide. The division utilizes CNC technology to provide custom HDU signs at wholesale pricing, including 3D Carved HDU Signs, Dimensional Signage, and Wholesale Sign Blanks.

articles.title: There's an Exclusive Sale-on-Sale on Gap Jeans Just for Strategist Readers
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: Gap is offering an exclusive additional 15 percent off on full-price and on-sale jeans with code STRAT15, valid until Sunday. The promotion includes various jean styles like High-Rise '90s Straight, High Rise '90s Loose, flares, and High-Rise UltraSoft Horseshoe.

articles.title: ShiftTechBD.com – A fast-growing e-commerce platform in Bangladesh
articles.summary: Shift Tech BD is planning to launch a reliable platform for other retail sellers, aiming to help them reach a broader audience through its e-commerce ecosystem. This expansion aims to transform Shift Tech BD into a complete digital marketplace for products and services nationwide.

articles.title: Amazon reviewers say this spin scrubber 'truly saves' their back and knees — and it's 88% off right now
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: The Electric Spin Scrubber, an adjustable cleaning tool, is currently on sale for $50 on Amazon Canada. It features eight detachable brushes, two speeds, and a handle extending to 43.3 inches. The scrubber has a 90-minute run time per charge and has received positive reviews for making cleaning easier and more convenient.

articles.title: Perfect Moment Announces $6.6 Million in New Financing, Securing Funding for FY26 and Beyond
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd., a luxury skiwear and lifestyle brand, operates within the high-performance sector.

articles.title: Urban Fresh Services Launches Wholesale HDU Signs Division – Setting a New Standard for Custom, ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Urban Fresh Services launched its Wholesale HDU Sign Division. This division offers 3D carved HDU signs, dimensional signage, and wholesale sign blanks to contractors, designers, and businesses nationwide.

articles.title: I tried running AI on my old GTX 1070 and it actually worked
articles.author: Gavin Phillips
articles.summary: LM Studio facilitates running local AI models like Qwen and gpt-oss on older hardware.  The Qwen model, developed by Alibaba, and OpenAI's gpt-oss-20b can be downloaded and used through LM Studio. These models offer a functional AI chatbot experience, despite hardware limitations, providing users with options for privacy and offline access.

articles.title: TikTok owner ByteDance sets valuation at over US$330 billion as revenue grows, sources say
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: ByteDance is launching a new product or service.

articles.title: Procter & Gamble's Innovation Playbook: Working or Wearing Thin?
articles.author: Zacks Equity Research
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble launched Swiffer PowerMop and debuted Tide evo, a plastic-free detergent. Colgate focuses on premiumization with Colgate Total and elmex, investing in formulations and sustainable packaging. Church & Dwight extends heritage brands like Arm & Hammer and OxiClean with new formats.

articles.title: Feisty Fizz celebrates first day of school
articles.author: Andrea Grabenstein
articles.summary: Feisty Fizz launched its mobile drink trailer service on August 27th at Centreville Elementary School. The service specializes in dirty sodas and fresh squeezed lemonades with unique flavor combinations.

articles.title: Dyson has slashed $160 off its most popular vacuum and it could transform your cleaning routine
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $160 discount on the V8 Absolute cordless vacuum, bringing the price down to $359.99. The Dyson V8 Absolute features up to 40 minutes of run time, fully sealed filtration, and comes with multiple tool attachments.

articles.title: Monde Nissin powers  deliveries with e-vehicles
articles.author: Richmond Mercurio
articles.summary: Monde Nissin Corp. has launched Monde Fresh Express, a sustainable distribution initiative using electric vehicles (EVs) for bread delivery. This program aims to improve service frequency, reduce food waste, and empower local entrepreneurs by offering them opportunities within a new delivery model. The company has deployed a fleet of electric vans to support the transformation of urban delivery routes.

articles.title: Precisely Delivers Real-World Intelligence with Launch of Dynamic Neighborhoods and Signal Engine
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Precisely launched Dynamic Neighborhoods and Signal Engine on August 27, 2025. These new products aim to help organizations gain actionable insights into population and audience behavior within the United States. The solutions transform location metrics and first-party data into audience-based insights.

articles.title: CrediCorp Inaugurates YouthCred Scheme In Lagos
articles.author: New Telegraph-Admin
articles.summary: The Nigerian Consumer Credit Corporation (CREDICORP) has launched YouthCred, a national credit scheme. This scheme aims to provide responsible and affordable consumer credit to over 400,000 young Nigerians.

articles.title: 37 Random Products To Buy If You Enjoy Spoiling Yourself
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Dossier introduced "Ambery Vanilla" perfume as a more affordable alternative to YSL's Black Opium. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, promising 24-hour hydration with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. E.l.f. released Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, a skincare item packed with hibiscus complex and hyaluronic acid.

articles.title: Household window gadget that stops mould and condensation
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: Karcher launched the WV1 Cordless Window Vacuum, a lightweight, rechargeable handheld device designed to clean surfaces. Screwfix sells the Karcher WV1 Cordless Window Vacuum for £39.99. The vacuum boasts features such as a powerful battery cleaning up to 70m² and a 250mm cleaner head, with Screwfix customers rating it 4.5/5 stars.

articles.title: This AI note taker is the size of a credit card and can record for days
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Plaud Note Pro is a new product that aims to help users avoid manual note-taking.

articles.title: Crumbl has launched its ‘dirty sodas' in Canada first before anywhere else
articles.summary: Crumbl is launching a new product line called 'Dirty Sodas' in Canada, featuring customizable handcrafted drinks. The lineup includes Crumbl Sodas, Crumbl Chargers (made with Red Bull), and Crumbl Coolers, available in Crumbl's iconic pink cup.

articles.title: Google Launches Image-to-Video Tool for Product Promotions
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google is introducing an updated Vids tool for paid Google Workspace customers, which allows brands to create product videos from still image assets using improved AI image-to-video generation powered by Veo. This new feature enables users to transform photos into eight-second video clips with sound, ensuring the animated video clips are aligned with the brand.

articles.title: Nigeria: The Definition - Abuja's Game-Changer in Urban Living
articles.author: Kofo Joseph
articles.summary: Gidanka launched "The Definition", a premium serviced apartment complex in Abuja, Nigeria. It features luxury apartments, co-working spaces, a fitness center, and access to The Uptown mall with 24-hour amenities. The Definition aims to provide a balanced lifestyle with a focus on wellness and productivity.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Aug 27, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new food and beverage products. Hint released a new Georgia Peach flavored water. Chex Mix introduced Hot & Spicy and Spicy Dill varieties. AG1 expanded its lineup with Next Gen flavors: Berry, Tropical and Citrus. Little Spoon partnered with Siete Foods to introduce two limited-edition meals Chicken Taco Bites Biteables and Beef Taco Smash Plate. Mission released Gluten Free Chickpea Tortilla Wraps. Farm Rich launched Buffalo Style Chicken Roll-Ups.

articles.title: New Android phone worth £1.5k and set to rival Samsung & Google could be yours for just £1 – here's how
articles.author: Jordan Farrell
articles.summary: Honor is launching its new premium smartphone, the Magic V5, in the UK on August 28. The phone features a folding screen, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, upgraded cameras, and IP58/IP59 dust and water resistance. Honor is running a promotion allowing customers to win the phone for £1 by subscribing to their newsletter.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 review: Pretty neat performer
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 features unique design elements, improved build quality, and longer battery life compared to its predecessor. It supports Galaxy AI features and Google's Gemini Live, Circle to Search. Additionally, the phone incorporates several gen AI-powered photography tools.

articles.title: MANTL Unveils Bulk Account Opening to Streamline Branch Operations, Simplify Banker Workflows, and Increase Wallet Share
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: MANTL, an Alkami solution team, launched MANTL Bulk Account Opening, a feature that enables financial institutions to open multiple accounts through a single application. The feature is designed to boost operational efficiency, deepen customer relationships, and enhance the in-branch experience. MANTL Bulk Account Opening helps banks increase wallet share and focus on customer needs.

articles.title: SanDisk's New WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD For Faster Apps, Bigger Files And Longer Battery Life
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: SanDisk WD Blue range introduces a new high-speed NVMe SSD. This SSD provides performance suitable for intensive tasks like video editing and handling large datasets.

articles.title: Aldi drops new stout cans that beer lovers say are ‘so much better than Guinness' and they're cheaper
articles.author: Allan Glen
articles.summary: Aldi is launching Mulligan's Stout on September 8, priced at £4.99 for a four-pack of 440ml cans. This new stout is described as having a deep black pour, creamy head, and notes of roasted malt, dark chocolate, and sweet toffee. Aldi is also launching a Specially Selected Chocolate Stout (£1.79, 500ml) with indulgent cocoa notes.

articles.title: Cult beauty brand takes you back to 90s with nostalgic buy that ‘comes alive in the fridge' -& it's already in stores
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lush has launched its new Halloween collection, including the Alien Egg Farm Shower Jelly. Priced at £10 for 250g, this vegan product contains lime, neroli, and fruit juice, and features a gummy alien inside. Customers have praised the product's scent and creative concept.

articles.title: Metro towns add laundromats with varying formats
articles.author: Vivian Kiesow Knudsen
articles.summary: Laundry Evolved, founded by Starla Jackson, opened in Brandon, offering washing, drying, folding, pickup, and delivery services with customizable options. The Laundry Co., established by Chandra and Andy Knowles, opened in Tea as a self-serve laundromat with various machine sizes and supplementary supplies.

articles.title: Samsung mocks iPhone in new ad, the reason is the foldable phone
articles.author: Ciar Medical Clinic
articles.summary: Samsung released an ad showcasing the capabilities of its foldable phones, specifically the Galaxy Z Fold7, and the 'Sketch on Image' feature powered by Galaxy AI. The 'Sketch on Image' feature allows users to create realistic images from simple sketches using AI, proving useful for creators.

articles.title: From Chrome to Cat Eyes: Sally Hansen Reinforces D.I.Y. Nail Legacy with Fall Launches
articles.author: Sally Hansen
articles.summary: Sally Hansen is launching new products this fall, including new additions to its Miracle Gel, Insta-Dri, and Salon Effects Perfect Press-Ons lines. These products focus on expanding color options, textures, and formulas that are beneficial for nail health, aiming to provide salon-quality self-expression at home.

articles.title: 2026 Volkswagen T-Roc Revealed With Hybrid Tech
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Volkswagen is introducing the new T-Roc. The T-Roc is a new product from Volkswagen.

articles.title: The New Plaud Note Pro Is An Advanced AI Note Taker Designed For Meetings, Calls Or Dreams
articles.author: Mark Sparrow
articles.summary: Plaud.ai has launched its new Plaud Note Pro, an AI-powered recording device. The device features studio-grade recording, intelligent noise isolation, and Plaud Intelligence for capturing and connecting every dimension of a conversation. Pre-orders begin August 27, 2025, with a starting price of $179, and includes a free startup plan with paid tiers available for increased usage.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's brand faces second blunder after cookie 'insect' video controversy
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's 'As Ever' product line, featuring herbal teas and orange marmalade, launched alongside the second series of her Netflix show. Despite a technical hiccup displaying placeholder items initially, the products sold out quickly, prompting Netflix to announce a new multi-year deal to expand Meghan's lifestyle brand.

articles.title: She Just Wanted An Acai Bowl, But She Was Told It Would Be Delayed Gratification
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: A Tropical Smoothie Cafe customer reported receiving an acai bowl that was frozen solid. According to the customer, the employees stated that the bowls are served frozen and require 15-25 minutes to thaw before consumption.

articles.title: The $35 Amazon find that will save your wedding guest outfits this season: 'It worked instantly!'
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: Pionix introduces the Pionix Handheld Garment Steamer, a portable device priced at $35 on Amazon, designed to quickly remove wrinkles from clothing. The steamer features a 100ml water reservoir, 25-second heating time, and can be used upright or horizontally.

articles.title: Dry washing quickly and for free this autumn with £4.49 Aldi item perfect for small spaces
articles.author: Sally McLean
articles.summary: Aldi is selling a £4.49 radiator and balcony dryer, designed for drying clothes quickly in small spaces. This product attaches to radiators or balconies and offers a cost-effective solution to avoid using expensive tumble dryers. Similar alternatives include the Over the Door Concertina Airer from Dunelm and radiator airers from Amazon.

articles.title: This Gen-X Beauty Trend Is Making a Massive Comeback
articles.summary: Henry Rose offers fully transparent fragrances, including body mists, created by Michelle Pfeiffer. Ouai launched St. Barts Hair & Body Mist, a light, 'vacation in a bottle' scent. Maison Louis Marie offers Fleur de la Passion, a grown-up, hydrating body mist infused with hyaluronic acid. Snif released Spray Tan, a nostalgic, gender-neutral summer scent. Dae offers Dream Veil, a fresh citrus scent body mist.

articles.title: Tech war: Huawei unveils drive storage products to help AI computing
articles.author: Ann Cao
articles.summary: Huawei has launched three new AI solid-state drive (SSD) products, OceanDisk EX 560, OceanDisk SP 560 and OceanDisk LC 560, designed to address data storage bottlenecks in AI training and inference for data centers. The company also announced the launch of an 'AI SSD Innovation Alliance' to promote industry collaboration.

articles.title: Deals of the week: €100 off the Dyson Airstrait, Aldi's kitchen offers plus €140 of beauty for €50
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Dyson offers €100 off on the Airstrait hair straightener. Aldi is launching a range of kitchen staples for students. BuzzBallz is giving away a year's supply of cocktails. LookFantastic releases the Living Proof Edit worth over €140 for €50. Space NK introduces its advent calendar for €299, worth over €1350.

articles.title: You'll Never Look At Regular Products The Same After Trying These 39 Elite Versions
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara for thin lashes.

articles.title: This Gen-X Beauty Trend Is Making a Massive Comeback
articles.author: Jessica Timmons
articles.summary: Henry Rose launched Mustang Sally, a body mist with petitgrain, neroli, and blood orange notes, emphasizing safety and quality. Maison Louis Marie introduced Fleur de la Passion, a fruity body mist with hyaluronic acid and seaweed extract for hydration. Snif released Spray Tan, a gender-neutral body mist evoking sun-warmed skin and tanning oil. Dae offers Dream Veil, a citrus-scented mist that smells like an orange grove.

articles.title: Household window gadget that 'works like a charm' to stop mould and condensation
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: Karcher's WV1 Cordless Window Vacuum is described as a lightweight, rechargeable handheld device designed to efficiently clean and dry surfaces, including shower screens and tiles. Screwfix customers have rated the gadget 4.5/5 stars, praising its ease of use and effectiveness in preventing mold and removing water from surfaces.

articles.title: Aussie treat that's coming to UK for the first time on sale at M&S today
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is launching a new range.

articles.title: ActiveCampaign Launches Square Loyalty Integration to Drive Repeat Business for Franchise and Multi-location Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ActiveCampaign has launched its Square Loyalty integration, expanding its partnership with Square. This integration allows businesses in food and beverage, retail, and professional services to automatically sync customer loyalty activity from Square into ActiveCampaign, enabling personalized marketing and increased order value across locations. It unifies marketing across locations while still allowing for store-level customization and reporting.

articles.title: Manulife Canada Unveils Streamlined Platform for Travel Agents Français
articles.author: Manulife Financial Corporation
articles.summary: Manulife Canada is launching a new platform for travel agents with features like the Non-Medical Premium Protection Plan, a Product Selector Tool, and Ongoing Engagement Capabilities. This platform aims to simplify insurance solutions and enhance the experience for both agents and travelers. Partner agencies have already started transitioning to the new platform.

articles.title: Punjab National Bank opens its first startup branch in New Delhi
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Punjab National Bank inaugurated a new Startup Branch at Bhikaji Cama Place, New Delhi. The branch aims to promote entrepreneurship and support innovation. The branch provides comprehensive banking solutions.

articles.title: Online car buying service opens new 'eco-friendly' outlet in Stirling
articles.author: Chris Marzella
articles.summary: Webuyanycar has launched a new 'pod branch' at Morrisons in Stirling. This new branch offers improved access for local customers and operates with solar energy and a paperless sales process. The Stirling branch is open seven days a week and provides instant bank transfers.

articles.title: INEOS Styrolution expands its supply of recycled polystyrene for dairy packaging across German supermarkets
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: ALDI SÜD stores will offer new sour cream cups made with 30% recycled content. This reflects an industry shift toward circular polystyrene food-contact packaging.

articles.title: Meet Mr. Fresh: Missouri's Young CEO on a Mission to Inspire and Empower (LISTEN)
articles.author: Cameron.Conner Missourinet.Com
articles.summary: Joshua Danrich, a 10-year-old entrepreneur, launched Mr. Fresh, a new line of air fresheners for cars and homes. The company is getting legal support to expand their business.

articles.title: SG60 Heart&Soul Experience launched at Orchard Central
articles.summary: SG60 Heart&Soul Experience launched at Orchard Central. This indicates a new service or product introduction.

articles.title: Pixel 10 writing assistance feature is rolling out to older Pixel phones
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Google is rolling out its Gboard writing tool, previously available only on Pixel 10, to older Pixel phones. The feature offers text suggestions, proofreading, rephrasing, and tone adjustments, similar to Gmail's 'Help me write' and Apple's writing tools. Users can access the writing tool through the suggestion tab in any chat interface on their Pixel phone.

articles.title: Samsung's latest Galaxy tablet beats the iPad with one perk Apple can't match
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, a new tablet with a 10.9-inch display, 90Hz refresh rate, 8,000mAh battery, and included S Pen stylus. It will be available in grey, silver, and Coralred, and is expected to cost around £349 when it goes on sale on September 5. The tablet comes with Galaxy AI software and includes a year's free subscription to Goodnotes.

articles.title: Huawei's new triple-fold phone may steal iPhone 17's thunder
articles.summary: Huawei will launch its Mate XTs triple-foldable smartphone on September 4 in China. The price is expected to be around $2,100. A wider global rollout is likely early next year.

articles.title: Finally, your Laffy Taffy wrapper won't stick to your candy
articles.author: Hunter Schwarz
articles.summary: Ferrara Candy Co. is launching Laffy Taffy with new and improved wrappers designed for a smoother opening experience. The wrappers are made from new materials, feature a 'material orientation' reducing shredding, and include updated instructions for optimal opening. The new wrappers will also feature updated crowd-sourced jokes.

articles.title: Genstore Launches AI-Native Store Builder that Simplifies E-Commerce for Local Businesses
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Genstore launched its AI-native e-commerce platform designed for small and micro businesses. The platform simplifies online store creation with features like AI-powered page and listing generation, marketplace integration, and an AI agent team to assist with various e-commerce operations.

articles.title: This 16-inch Acer with an OLED screen has no business being this good for the price
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Acer introduced the Swift 16 AI laptop. The new laptop features a sleek design, an OLED display, and extended battery life.

articles.title: 📸 Uefa unveils new ball for the Champions League
articles.author: One Football
articles.summary: UEFA and Adidas unveiled the official ball for the 2025/2026 Champions League edition. The ball is white.

articles.title: The Play Store can now auto-open newly installed apps
articles.author: Chethan Rao
articles.summary: Google Play Store is rolling out a revised "Auto-open when ready" toggle, which automatically opens apps after installation. This new feature includes a five-second timer notification with Open and Cancel options, providing users with a convenient way to immediately jump into newly installed apps.

articles.title: Thinksmiths Software Services Launches ThinkTests: A Platform That Revolutionizes How Students Prepare for Competitive Exams
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Thinksmiths Software Services Pvt Ltd launched ThinkTests, a comprehensive digital platform for competitive exam preparation, starting with modules for SOF National Science Olympiad (NSO) and International Mathematics Olympiad (IMO). The platform offers Mock Tests, Custom Modules, and Daily Practice tools, along with advanced performance analytics and transparent progress tracking.

articles.title: ALDI LAUNCHES UK SUPERMARKET FIRST ANGEL HAIR ICE CREAM FOLLOWING VIRAL TIKTOK CRAZE
articles.author: Europe Says
articles.summary: ALDI has launched Angel Hair Ice Cream, a UK supermarket first, following a viral TikTok trend. This marks the introduction of a new ice cream product by ALDI.

articles.title: New Kinder chocolates spotted on supermarket shelves & fans are calling them ‘heavenly'
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Kinder has launched a new product called Kinder Choco Balls Sensations, which are available at Morrisons. The treat features a creamy center coated in milk chocolate with crunchy hazelnut pieces, is individually wrapped, and is marketed as a festive treat. A 90g box is priced at £2.75.

articles.title: Lidl Northern Ireland Kickstart range returns to stores
articles.author: Gavin Walker
org: Northern Ireland Food and Drink Association
articles.summary: Lidl Northern Ireland launched over 30 new products from more than 17 local producers in its stores on September 11th through the Kickstart Supplier Development Programme. The product range includes items from Big Pot Co, McAtamney's Gourmet Kitchen, Jackson Roze, Steeper Culture, New Found Joy, Bakers Wee Buns, Dukes Ultra-Premium Ice Cream, and Al Gelato, among others, showcasing a variety of Northern Irish artisanal foods and wellness products.

articles.title: 'adidas always cook!' - Cristiano Ronaldo models Al-Nassr's eye-catching new away kit for 2025-26 season as Joao Felix & Sadio Mane also star in unveiling video
articles.author: Soham Mukherjee
articles.summary: Adidas has launched a new away kit for Al-Nassr, featuring a navy and turquoise topographic design. The kit includes white accents for the Adidas logo, sponsor KAFD, and the Al-Nassr crest. Al-Nassr is expected to debut the new kit on August 29 against Al-Taawoun.

articles.title: Google AI Mode Launches in Pakistan
articles.author: Maham Hussain
articles.summary: Google has launched 'AI Mode' in Pakistan, a new feature powered by a custom Gemini 2.5 model that allows users to ask complex questions and receive comprehensive answers with relevant links. The 'AI Mode' supports multimodal input, including audio, text, and photographs, streamlining and simplifying the search experience for users in Pakistan.

articles.title: How the Buyline reviews experts test air fryers
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: The article reviews air fryers, specifically mentioning the 'Ninja Foodi Max Dual Zone Air Fryer' and 'Salter VertiCook View Air Fryer'. The reviews are based on tests of cooking performance, energy efficiency, and ease of cleaning. The reviews aim to provide honest opinions.

articles.title: DesignNBuy's Packaging Design Software is a Game-Changer
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: DesignNBuy has launched its Packaging Design Software, enabling packaging businesses to deliver faster, smarter, and more sustainable solutions. This software allows customers to design, customize, and order packaging online, while helping businesses automate proofing, streamline production, and reduce errors. Key features include 3D previews, real-time sizing, inside/outside personalization, a pricing engine, embellishment options, and AI-powered design tools.

articles.title: Dry your wet washing & save space with Aldi's £4 autumn gadget – you won't need to use a dehumidifier or tumble dryer
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a budget-friendly Dryer for Heating or Balcony in UK stores for £4.49. This fold-out dryer is designed as a low-cost alternative to tumble dryers for drying clothes, especially in homes with limited space.

articles.title: Why Harnaaz Sandhu is the new star that Bollywood should watch out for...
articles.author: Vaishnavi Tripathi
articles.summary: Sajid Nadiadwala is launching Harnaaz Sandhu into Bollywood. This debut is expected to be successful given Nadiadwala's track record of launching stars.

articles.title: Philips unveils its ‘smartest shaver' yet in time for Father's Day
articles.author: 7NEWS Australia
articles.summary: Philips has introduced its latest 'smartest shaver'. The product launch coincides with Father's Day.

articles.title: What CISOs can learn from Doppel's new AI-driven social engineering simulation
articles.summary: Doppel introduced Doppel Simulation, a new product expanding its platform for defending against social engineering. This tool utilizes autonomous AI agents to create multi-channel simulations mirroring attacker operations across email, SMS, messaging apps, and more.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite Tablet With 8,000mAh Battery Announced: All Details
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite now includes Galaxy AI features. The updated tablet ships with an S Pen and contains an 8,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Zoho ANZ sees 20% customer growth, unveils new offerings & AI
articles.author: IT Brief Australia
articles.summary: Zoho introduced new AI-powered solutions, Zoho Solo and Zoho for Nonprofits. These solutions are aimed at enhancing regional impact and innovation. The company's ANZ customer base experienced a 20% growth as a result.

articles.title: 100M Key Lookups/Sec with REST API and Python
articles.author: Mikael Ronström
articles.summary: RonDB 24.10 introduces a new REST API interface for AI models. This interface facilitates the retrieval of record batches from multiple tables using key lookups. The implementation uses C++ and simdjson for faster JSON parsing.

articles.title: Vietnam's NFC taps top freeze-dried tech to target ready-to-eat market
articles.author: Audrey Yow
articles.summary: NFC is expanding its portfolio of freeze-dried products, introducing iSoup freeze-dried mushroom soup broth and I-Ya.Ua freeze-dried yoghurt for international markets. The company plans to further expand its range of convenient, nutritious, and safe products to cater to modern dining experiences.

articles.title: LG Leads Thailand's OLED TV Market Again
articles.summary: LG Electronics (Thailand) aims to strengthen its leadership in the final quarter of 2025 by expanding its premium TV lineup with models like the LG OLED evo AI and LG QNED evo AI, which includes screen sizes up to 100 inches. They are also enhancing AI capabilities in their TVs, adapting to individual voices and viewing habits, optimising picture and sound settings and integrating with LG ThinQ app to enable connectivity with other IoT devices.

articles.title: The Moto G Stylus 2021 leaked on Amazon, revealing bigger screen and price
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Amazon listing leaked the 2021 Moto G Stylus. Phone Arena spotted specs and images of the phone. The phone is expected to be affordable.

articles.title: 33 Inexpensive Kitchen Items That Don't Seem Like They'd Change Your Life…But They Will
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Oxo introduced the compact Brew Rapid Brewer. Dawn introduced Platinum Powerwash dish spray. The Pink Stuff released "Sqeezy" sponge set. These products aim to provide solutions for kitchen related problem.

articles.title: Meta's ‘Hypernova' AI smart specs will be an ‘experimental' device
articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.summary: Rokid AI Glasses were showcased following the unveiling of Google Pixel 10 series. The product is being assessed for its potential utility, especially in comparison to Ray-Ban Meta glasses, which are noted for content creation. The glasses aim to improve upon earlier attempts like Google Glass.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3) Review: Quirky Spin on High Tech Smartphone
articles.author: Nick Broughall
articles.summary: Nothing has launched its latest smartphone, the Nothing Phone (3), featuring a unique see-through rear design with a Glyph Matrix, a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, and a focus on AI features. The phone is powered by a 5,150 mAh battery with 65W fast charging support and is available starting at $1509.

articles.title: 2025年服贸会将首发190多项新产品、新成果_手机网易网
articles.author: 财联社
articles.summary: Over a hundred companies will premiere more than 190 new products and achievements at the 2025 China International Fair for Trade in Services (服贸会). The event will showcase service demonstration cases in fields such as artificial intelligence and green innovation. Among the featured products are the world's first 3D-printed polymer anti-fatigue absorbable vascular stent, an upgraded version of a full-field intelligent magnetic resonance system, and China's first professional optical quantum computer exceeding a thousand qubits.

articles.title: Suzuki Fronx gets drive-away deal ahead of first Australian deliveries
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Maruti, a Suzuki division, designed and developed the Fronx in India. The Fronx is exported to markets including Australia and Japan. The Fronx shares its platform with the updated Baleno.

articles.title: 26 Products You'll Wish You'd Tried Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Nivea introduces a lightweight gel cream with Q10, improving skin firmness in two weeks. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to reduce swelling and puffiness. Gold Bond releases firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Wet & Forget unveils exterior spray for mold and algae removal. Mise En Scene launches a hair serum made with argan, coconut, olive, and jojoba oils. Mielle introduces Rosemary Mint strengthening oil and Sol de Janerio launches Brazilian Bum Bum body cream. Truremedy Naturals launches Remedy Tea Tree Oil Body Wash made with aloe, mint, and tea tree soap.

articles.title: Starship Flight 10: Near-Total Success & Booster Landing!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Marketers use generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Gemini for content creation, leading to increased efficiency. Businesses are integrating AI to personalize content and optimize SEO, with AI-powered tools analyzing and improving content across platforms. These advancements are reshaping content creation and SEO strategies.

articles.title: Is joining an online wine club worth it? We tried Naked Wines to find out
articles.author: Melissa Field
articles.summary: Naked Wines introduces a new member offer of $89.99 for 12 wines, providing access to independent Australian and New Zealand winemakers. The company also offers a $40 monthly subscription plan, allowing customers to save on wines, with new members receiving $100 off their first purchase. Customers can cancel their subscription at any time.

articles.title: 华为将于9月4日发布新款 三折叠手机_手机网易网
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: Huawei will release a new triple-folding phone on September 4th.

articles.title: Guest Posts – Directories: Expanding Your Digital Strategy
articles.author: Editor In Chief
articles.summary: The article highlights press releases as tools for local businesses, noting that they can be used to announce new product launches. STL.News, appearing in Google News and Apple News, is a platform that consumers check daily for updates. The releases create immediate buzz and drive traffic during critical windows of opportunity.

articles.title: Google brings AI mode to Pakistan
articles.author: NEWS WIRE
articles.summary: Google has launched its AI Mode in Pakistan, an AI-powered search experience that allows users to ask more complex questions and receive faster, more comprehensive answers. This feature, powered by a custom version of Gemini 2.5, is now available in English on the Google App and web, offering multimodal search capabilities and improved factuality for Pakistani users.

articles.title: 37 Products With Mind-Blowing Before And Afters Photos
articles.author: Amanda Davis
articles.summary: Medix launched a non-greasy retinol body lotion that minimizes wrinkles and tightens skin. Eight Saints introduced a neck and chest firming cream with protein peptides, vitamin B5, green tea, and hyaluronic acid. Hawaiian Tropic released SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush as a protective setting powder. Burt's Bees offers sunburn soother made with aloe and coconut oil. Bissell introduced Little Green Multi-Purpose Cleaner for dirt and pet stains and Revlon launched a volcanic face roller for absorbing shine and Stila has released One-Step color-correcting facial serum. Similarly Sunny & Honey, Mise En Scene and Veet had launched carpet cleaner, hair serum and hair removal gel respectively.

articles.title: Lotte Shopping's e-commerce platform Lotte On announced on the 27th that it will hold a video contes..
articles.author: Kim Hyejin
articles.summary: Lotte On, Lotte Shopping's e-commerce platform, launched "Twiz," a new beauty curation app. To promote the app, Lotte On is holding a video contest where participants create videos showcasing Twiz's functions and advantages. New subscribers to Twiz will receive up to 1,000 L.POINT points until August 31.

articles.title: The only reason I don't buy Samsung phones is bloatware
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Samsung's One UI, an Android skin, will be updated to version 8 based on Android 16. This update is currently available on the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7, with plans to expand to more devices in September. The company continues to integrate it's proprietary apps like Samsung Health and SmartThings with the Samsung products.

articles.title: Guests test Huawei Pura 80 series smartphones in Bucharest, Romania
articles.author: 新华网
articles.summary: Huawei launched its Pura 80 series smartphones and a tablet product in Bucharest, Romania on August 26, 2025. Guests at the launching event tested the new Huawei Pura 80 series smartphones.

articles.title: M&S launches new �4 treat in claimed 'first' for UK high street
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: M&S will make available two flavours of a treat in their stores starting Wednesday. This represents a new product launch for the company.

articles.title: Anthropic Just Launched A Claude Agent For The Chrome Browser, But Most Users Can't Have It
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Anthropic is rolling out the Claude agent for Chrome to select subscribers. This agent is designed to assist users with the content they are browsing, indicating a new feature or service introduction.

articles.title: Rokid Brings AI Glasses Launch to New York City
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Rokid launched its new AI & AR smart glasses in New York City. The device is positioned as the world's lightest full-function AI & AR smart glasses, weighing only 49 grams.

articles.title: Guests test Huawei Pura 80 series smartphones in Bucharest, Romania
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Huawei launched its Pura 80 series smartphones and a new tablet product at a launching event in Bucharest, Romania, on August 26, 2025. Guests were able to test the new Huawei Pura 80 series smartphones during the event.

articles.title: Anthropic launches Claude AI agent extension for Chrome
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Anthropic launched Claude for Chrome, a new AI agent browser extension. This extension enables users to interact with the Claude AI chatbot via a side panel in Chrome, allowing Claude to perform actions based on user requests.

articles.title: Explore Roborock's state of the art vacuum cleaners
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Roborock's smart cleaners are revolutionizing domestic cleaning.

articles.title: Plaud upgrades its card-sized AI note-taker with better range
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Plaud is launching the Plaud Note Pro, an upgraded version of their AI-powered note-taking device. This new model features two additional microphones for improved recording capabilities. Like the original, it uses AI to record, transcribe, and summarize conversations.

articles.title: Ainewsbreaks Nightfood Holdings Inc. (NGTF) Set To Revolutionize Culinary Education With AI
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Nightfood Holdings, through its subsidiary Future Hospitality Ventures Holdings Inc. operating as RoboOp365, signed an agreement.

articles.title: Smart value tablet deals are live on Amazon! Get up to 48% off on Samsung, ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Amazon is currently offering deals on tablets from brands like Samsung, Lenovo, and Xiaomi. These tablets are suitable for everyday tasks such as watching videos, browsing the internet, and handling basic work or school-related needs.

articles.title: Rokid Glasses Hands-On: Smart Glasses, Buggy Voice Assistant
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Rokid introduced new smart glasses featuring a display. Initial impressions suggest that Meta does not need to be concerned.

articles.title: Who needs Asus' fancy flagship monitor? This dual-mode OLED screen stole the show and my ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Asus announced a new flagship OLED monitor. The monitor is positioned as a premium product.
